name: AnimVR
description: A powerful timeline, virtual cameras, audio recording, fading & editing - combined with frame by frame drawing, and advanced import and export capabilities, make AnimVR the most advanced and versatile VR animation software currently available. Plus it's lot's of fun to use!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 2.6GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Built In
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
